remarks: Reverse a directed integral.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
statement:
ditgcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
ditgcl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. RR ) $.
ditgcl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( X [,] Y ) ) $.
ditgcl.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( X [,] Y ) ) $.
ditgcl.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( X (,) Y ) ) -> C e. V ) $.
ditgcl.i $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. ( X (,) Y ) |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
ditgswap $p |- ( ph -> S_ [ B -> A ] C _d x = -u S_ [ A -> B ] C _d x ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d V x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
